title: Ticket #6028: Fix up condor_transform_ads documentation
description:
I put in condor_transform_ads documentation for 8.5.8, but it still needs some fixes:
  • Some command-line options are not documented.
  • Move the documentation of the transform rules from the wiki into the manual.
  • Document the TRANSFORM command.
  • Better document the <key>=<value> command-line option.
creator: wenger
